Class BaseShapeChartObject

Namespace
FinScript.Rendering.ChartObjects

FinScript.Core.dll

Base class for chart object, that is a shape

[PublicAPI]
public abstract class BaseShapeChartObject : ChartObject, IScriptUnit, INameDescriptionProvider, INameProvider, IPropertyDisplayInfoProvider, ICloneable, IScriptEnvironmentAssigner, IChartElement, IChartRenderable, IZOrderAssigner, IChartHitTestable, IBackgroundProvider, IStrokeProvider, IPixelOffsetProvider

HorizontalBarOffset

X offset in bars. 1 means a width of a single bar. Default value is 0

public double HorizontalBarOffset { get; set; }

Property Value

double

HorizontalPixelOffset

X offset in pixels, additional to current label position. Negative numbers means shift to left, positive numbers - shift to right

public double HorizontalPixelOffset { get; set; }

Property Value

double

Stroke

Stroke which describes color, width and pattern of graphical object which can be drawn by pencil (in other words, any line)

public Stroke Stroke { get; }

Property Value

Stroke

VerticalPixelOffset

Y offset in pixels, additional to current label position. Negative numbers means shift up, positive numbers - shift down

public double VerticalPixelOffset { get; set; }

Property Value

double
